sqlMap.select: SELECT ID as id, FIRSTNAME as firstName, MIDDLENAME as middleName, LASTNAME as lastName, STREET as street, CITY as city, PROVINCE as province, COUNTRY as country, ENCODERID as encoderId FROM ABDUCTOR WHERE ID = #id#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO ABDUCTOR (FIRSTNAME, MIDDLENAME, LASTNAME, STREET, CITY, PROVINCE, COUNTRY, ENCODERID) VALUES (#firstName#, #middleName#, #lastName#, #street#, #city#, #province#, #country#, #encoderId#)
sqlMap.update: UPDATE ABDUCTOR SET FIRSTNAME = #firstName#, MIDDLENAME = #middleName#, LASTNAME = #lastName#, STREET = #street#, CITY = #city#, PROVINCE = #province#, COUNTRY = #country#, ENCODERID = #encoderId# WHERE ID = #id#
